OwnerServices.title: Our key services can unleash the potential of your property
OwnerServices.desc: Our mission is to offer complete services which are totally transparent to the owner. Calendars, bookings, prices, expenses, and revenue - everything is one click away.
OwnerServices.quote: "We pride ourselves on being close to every single one of our partners."

transparency.title: Online Transparency
transparency.desc: Access everything about your property and listings 24/7 from anywhere in the world thanks to our LovelyStay dashboard.

checkin.title: Check-in & Check-out
checkin.desc: Our hospitality team offers constant guest communication 24/7 and is readily available to meet all guest's needs.

cleaning.title: Cleaning & Maintenance
cleaning.desc: We take care of your property and are always there to fix any situation, even when you are not.

account.title: Account Managers
account.desc: The purpose of our dedicated account managers is to be there for you & represent your best interest in every situation.

design.title: Interior Design
design.desc: Our hospitality experts can support you in enhancing your space so as to improve your profitability.

legal.title: Fiscal & Legal Support
legal.desc: We offer tech solutions and consultancy services for any topic related to the rental of your property.

OwnerExperience.title: Experience you can trust: delivering results for property owners
OwnerExperience.desc: LovelyStay is recognized for providing high-quality property management services to owners in Portugal and abroad. With an experienced team in the areas of hospitality, revenue management, and information technology.

OwnerPricing.title: Join us and enjoy worry-free property management!
OwnerPricing.subtitle: Combine our packages to create a personalized management solution!

total.selectPrompt: Select a package to see fee.

AboutIntro.p1: The core of our business is to excel in what we do and strive to keep our position as the leading boutique property management company in Porto, where we currently focus all of our operations. We are passionate about the city and proud to be the starting point of every of our guests journey in this captivating and stunningly beautiful city.
AboutIntro.p2: We handpick and decorate our properties to the highest standards just so you feel truly welcome and taken care of, and that goes far beyond the aesthetic of the property you are staying in. Our unparalleled service is the key to our success.

2020.title: The Beginning
2020.text: We opened our office and Welcome Center in Porto's downtown, marking the start of our journey in this stunningly beautiful city.

2021.title: Growth & Resilience
2021.text: Despite the global challenges, we handpicked more properties and refined our unparalleled service to ensure our guests felt truly welcome.

2022.title: Expanding Horizons
2022.text: Our boutique property management company became a reference in Porto, expanding our portfolio with curated, high-standard homes.

2023.title: Design & Excellence
2023.text: We integrated deeper interior design expertise to elevate the aesthetic of our properties, merging comfort with luxury.

2024.title: Innovative Connections
2024.text: Launching new digital experiences to bridge the gap between our local expertise and our guests' global expectations.

2025.title: The Future of Hospitality
2025.text: Striving to keep our position as the leading boutique company, constantly evolving our operations for better guest experiences.

2026.title: Global Reach
2026.text: From Porto to the World - our mission remains firm: to provide the best local memories through global standards of excellence.

AboutForm.title: Our Team At Your Service
AboutForm.subtitle: If you have a property and would like us to manage it and increase your revenue, talk to us!
